personalInfo.name: Kishore Kumar S S
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Developer & ML Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Full-stack engineer focused on backend reliability, explainable ML systems, and streamlined developer workflows. I pair strong CS fundamentals with delivery across Spring Boot, Node.js, and production-ready ML dashboards, translating ambiguous ideas into audited, secure products.

achievements: Owned backend hardening for secure multi-role authentication, JWT issuance, and auditable REST endpoints.
Optimized SQL queries and caching, trimming API latency by roughly 24% and boosting transaction throughput.
Structured audit logging improved log reliability by about 30% with deterministic export formats for compliance.
Worked inside sprint cadences with PR reviews and reproducible unit-test suites for every feature drop.
Designed modular data schemas and validation contracts that expanded dataset coverage by about 35%.
Built Streamlit evaluation dashboards and prototype services cutting model evaluation-to-insight time by 50%.
Iterative error analysis plus label corrections lifted recall for target screening workflows by 12%.
Partnered with product, data-ops, and engineering to ship reproducible deployments with clear ownership.

projects.title: AI-Driven Water Stress Monitoring
projects.description: Pipeline for monitoring plant water stress with explainable ensembles and IoT hooks.
projects.problem: Growers lacked fast, explainable insights about plant stress, delaying irrigation decisions and wasting sensors.
projects.approach: Built modular preprocessing->training->inference pipeline with RF/GBM/SVM ensemble, Streamlit dashboards, SHAP analysis, and MQTT-ready ingestion for ESP32 units.

projects.title: Advanced Diabetes Prediction System
projects.description: Explainable risk scoring with clustering-aware imputation and XGBoost.
projects.problem: Static screening flows missed nuanced risk signals and failed to justify recommendations to clinicians.
projects.approach: Implemented KNN-imputation tuned by clustering, trained XGBoost, and wired SHAP/LIME narratives plus reproducible inference scripts for quick redeploys.

projects.title: Context-Aware IaP Memory Engine
projects.description: RAG-driven conversational infrastructure manager for cloud changes.
projects.problem: Platform teams repeated infrastructure steps across chats and consoles without semantic recall.
projects.approach: Shipped FastAPI service with ChromaDB memory, retrieval-augmented prompts, and AWS Cloud Control API actions to replay intent-driven operations.

projects.title: BankOps Portal
projects.description: Full-stack system design for secure operational workflows at Muthoot.
projects.problem: Manual back-office flows lacked auditable access control and delayed transaction visibility.
projects.approach: Delivered multi-role authorization, transactional endpoints, audit trails, and resilient error handling on Spring Boot + MySQL.

projects.title: VitHub E-Commerce Frontend
projects.description: Responsive storefront with catalog, cart, and component-driven flows.
projects.problem: Student community sellers needed a performant storefront to demo inventory and checkout logic.
projects.approach: Built reusable React components, search + catalog filtering, and REST-backed cart workflows with testable modules.

awards.title: 2nd Prize - Hack the Future (IIT Gandhinagar)
awards.description: Prototype recognized for practical impact and clear ML instrumentation.

awards.title: Events Head - IISE
awards.description: Led events with 1000+ participants, coordinating speakers, schedules, and volunteer pods.
